name: Albino Rhoa Feather
uses: Shift click to unstack.

name: Alchemy Shard
uses: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy  Shift click to unstack.

name: Arcanist's Etcher
description: Improves the quality of a wand, staff or sceptre
uses: Right click this item then left click a wand, staff or sceptre to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Armourer's Scrap
description: Improves the quality of an armour
uses: Right click this item then left click an armour to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Artificer's Orb
description: Adds a Rune Socket to a Martial Weapon or Armour
uses: Right click this item then left click a Martial Weapon or Armour to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Artificer's Shard
uses: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Artificer's Orb.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Black Scythe Artifact
uses: These can be used to trade with Tujen.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Blacksmith's Whetstone
description: Improves the quality of a martial weapon
uses: Right click this item then left click a martial weapon to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Broken Circle Artifact
uses: These can be used to trade with Gwennen.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Bronze Key
description: Used to open Bronze Caches within the Trials

name: Chance Shard
uses: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Chance.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Chaos Orb
description: Removes a random modifier and augments a Rare item with a new random modifier
uses: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Divine Orb
description: Randomises the numeric values of modifiers on an item
uses: Right click this item then left click an item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Exalted Orb
description: Augments a Rare item with a new random modifier
uses: Right click this item then left click a rare item to apply it. Rare items can have up to six random modifiers.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Exotic Coinage
uses: These can be brought to Tujen, Gwennen or Rog to refresh their vendor inventory.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Gemcutter's Prism
description: Improves the quality of a skill gem
uses: Right click this item then left click a skill gem to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Glassblower's Bauble
description: Improves the quality of a flask
uses: Right click this item then left click a flask to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Gold
description: Can be spent at Vendors.
uses: Shift click to unstack.

name: Gold Key
description: Used to open Gold Caches within the Trials

name: Greater Jeweller's Orb
description: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 3 Support Gem Sockets
uses: Right click this item then left click a Skill Gem to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Lesser Jeweller's Orb
description: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 2 Support Gem Sockets
uses: Right click this item then left click a Skill Gem to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Mirror of Kalandra
description: Creates a Mirrored copy of an item
uses: Right click this item then left click an equipable non-unique item to apply it. Mirrored copies cannot be modified.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Orb of Alchemy
description: Upgrades a Normal item to a Rare item with 4 modifiers
uses: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Orb of Annulment
description: Removes a random modifier from an item
uses: Right click this item then left click on a magic or rare item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Orb of Augmentation
description: Augments a Magic item with a new random modifier
uses: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Magic items can have up to two random modifiers.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Orb of Chance
description: Unpredictably either upgrades a Normal item to Unique rarity or destroys it
uses: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Orb of Transmutation
description: Upgrades a Normal item to a Magic item with 1 modifier
uses: Right click this item then left click a normal item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Order Artifact
uses: These can be used to trade with Rog.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Perfect Jeweller's Orb
description: Adds a Support Gem Socket to a Skill Gem with 4 Support Gem Sockets
uses: Right click this item then left click a Skill Gem to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Regal Orb
description: Upgrades a Magic item to a Rare item, adding 1 modifier
uses: Right click this item then left click a magic item to apply it. Current modifiers are retained and a new one is added.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Regal Shard
uses: A stack of 10 shards becomes a Regal Orb.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Scroll of Wisdom
description: Identifies an item
uses: Right click this item then left click an unidentified item to apply it.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Silver Key
description: Used to open Silver Caches within the Trials

name: Sun Artifact
uses: These can be used to trade with Dannig.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Transmutation Shard
uses: A stack of 10 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation  Shift click to unstack.

name: Vaal Orb
description: Modifies an item unpredictably and Corrupts it
uses: Right click this item then left click an item to corrupt it. Corrupted items cannot be modified again.  Shift click to unstack.

name: Adaptive Catalyst
description: Adds quality that enhances Attribute modifiers on a ring or amulet
uses: Right click this item then left click a ring or amulet to apply it. The maximum quality is 20%.  Shift click to unstack.
